name: An ancient steel ring
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom somewhat.
It decreases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users physical resistance adequately.
It decreases the users psionic resistance adequately.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'rage'.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'berserk'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'ignore pain'.
